column4: Well, here's an interesting one. Trying to run WoW in wine. It runs decently (though abit slow on the framerate) at a niceness of 0. If I try and run it at a niceness of 1; it won't draw anything. Renicing apparently seems to work, though.
run it at a niceness of -1*
turn off compiz (desktop effects ) also change the run command to include ( -opengl) and frame rates should improve (also ask in #winehq)
compiz is off; I believe I set WoW to use opengl using the configuration file.
